自身下1次生命≤0时，复活并回复到64生命
（次数可叠加）
text_en:
[Gather Qi] 6
For the next 1 time when your HP ≤ 0, you will be resurrected and restored to 64 HP
(The number of times can be stacked)

text_zh:
[蓄灵]9
[激活]全部[五行]
复制后一格牌的效果
[再次行动]（不会被其他效果阻止）
text_en:
[Gather Qi] 9
[Activate] all [Five Elements]
Duplicate the effect of the card in the next slot
[Chase] (Cannot be stoped by other effects)

text_zh:
30攻
令对方无法加生命，持续1回合
[击伤]：对方下次生命≤0时，对其造成20命元伤害
text_en:
30 ATK
Your opponent cannot add HP for 1 turn
[Injured]: For the next time when your opponent's HP ≤ 0, deal 20 Destiny Damage to your opponent.

text_zh:
[蓄灵]7
生命及上限+64
自身下1次回合开始时生命加倍
[消耗]
text_en:
[Gather Qi] 7
HP and Max HP + 64
At the beginning of your next 1 turn, your HP will be doubled.
[Consumption]

text_zh:
[蓄灵]4
令对方当前[灵气]、生命、生命上限减半
施加4层[困缚]
text_en:
[Gather Qi] 4
Reduce the opponent's current [Qi], HP, and Max HP by half
Apply 4 [Entangled]

text_zh:
复制对方下1张牌的效果
令对方[跳过]下1张牌
[再次行动]
text_en:
Copy the effect of your opponent's next card
[Skip] the opponent's next card
[Chase]

text_zh:
生命上限永久+5
下2次使用可升级的牌时将其永久[升级]
[再次行动]
[消耗]
text_en:
Max HP+5 in this game.
The next 2 times you play an upgradable card, upgrade it in this game.
[Chase]
[Consumption]

text_zh:
[蓄灵]6
从卡组第一格开始直至此牌，依次重复每一张已用过的牌的效果
text_en:
[Gather Qi] 6
Starting from the first card in your deck up to this card, repeat the effect of each card that has already been played.

text_zh:
[灵气]+4
生命及上限+16
只要此牌在卡组中，战斗结束后随机获得2张3级的灵植师或炼丹师炼化牌
text_en:
[Qi]+4
HP and Max HP + 16
As long as this card is in your deck, at the end of battle you gain 2 Lv. 3 cards of Elixirist or Plant Master with [Absorb].

text_zh:
[蓄灵]4
对方下4次使用牌时将牌[降级]，若不可降级则改为吸取其9生命及上限
[开局]：对方下2次使用牌受以上效果影响
text_en:
[Gather Qi] 4
[Downgrade] opponent's next 4 cards on play. If a card cannot be downgraded, instead steal 9 HP and Max HP.
[Opening]: Apply above effect to opponent's next 2 cards
